result.reason: Adding a global hotkey (CTRL+ALT+HOME) to focus the application is a valid usability enhancement requested by users.
result.approach: Implement a global hotkey listener using RegisterHotKey Win32 API in FrmMain to detect CTRL+ALT+HOME and bring the application window to the foreground.
